name: Apple Dip
ingredients: 1st Layer: Mix with beater until smooth
1 17 oz. jar Mrs. Richardson's butterscotch caramel fudge
steps: Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Cut up apples in wedges and put in the following solution.
Stir. After a few minutes, dump apples in a colander and rinse with water. This keeps the apples from going brown.
